sn2.7:1.2: Standing to one side, the young deva Pañcālacaṇḍa recited this verse in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn2.7:2.1: “The one of broad wisdom has indeed found
sn2.7:2.2: The opening in the midst of confinement,
sn2.7:2.4: The withdrawn chief bull, the sage. ”
sn2.7:3.1: “Even in the midst of confinement they find it,
sn2.7:3.3: “The Dhamma for the attainment of Nibbāna—
